p.p: Default Scheme: NHS Data Dictionary Discharge Method

A code representing the method used to discharge a patient from care, typically an acute inpatient episode, using the values listed in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary definition for Discharge Method.

concept.displayName: Patient discharged on clinical advice or with clinical consent
Patient discharged him/herself or was discharged by a relative or advocate
